channel.title: Comments on: The pros and cons of 4 deployment process techniques
channel.description: Plataformatec's place to talk about Ruby, Ruby on Rails, Elixir, and software engineering

item.title: By: kaceylu
item.dc:creator: kaceylu
item.content:encoded:
I found the entire Software Tailor team to very helpful and knowledgeable.
You help me understand the differences between the other systems on the market
and the software development HK

item.title: By: Tim
item.dc:creator: Tim
item.description: We use the support branch way at my company, but I am really trying to get us to move towards the open source way.
item.content:encoded: We use the support branch way at my company, but I am really trying to get us to move towards the open source way.

item.title: By: Micah Geisel
item.dc:creator: Micah Geisel
item.description:
| “Gosh! I need to fix that merge conflict again.”
Have a look at `git rerere` and `git config --global rerere.enabled 1`
item.content:encoded:
| “Gosh! I need to fix that merge conflict again.”

Have a look at `git rerere` and `git config –global rerere.enabled 1`
